pageProduct.name: Swisse Kids Immune Health 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Busy children are exposed to environments that may challenge their immune system. The immune system is composed of cells and molecules organised into specialised tissues, which act as the body's first line of defence.

?Vitamin C and zinc to support immune system function & help stimulate a healthy immune system response
?Vitamin C to support dietary iron absorption when dietary intake is inadequate
?Vitamin C to support dietary iron absorption when dietary intake is inadequate
?Great tasting
?Natural apple flavour
?99% sugar free
?Convenient chewable tablet
?No added artifical colours

Size: 60 Pack

Warnings

Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner.

Ingredients

EACH CHEWABLE TABLET CONTAINS:
VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid from calcium ascorbate dihydrate 121.04 mg) 100 mg
VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid from sodium ascorbate 98.43 mg) 87.50 mg
VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid) 62.50 mg
Total Vitamin C 250 mg
ZINC (from zinc amino acid chelate 15 mg) 3 mg
CITRUS BIOFLAVONOIDS EXTRACT 5 mg

Directions

2-8 years: Chew one tablet daily during or immediately after a meal. 9-12 years: Chew two tablets daily during or immediately after a meal. Or as directed by a healthcare professional. Do not swallow whole.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
